testcase.name: User launch and register the website, then order and checking functionality of website
testcase.system-out: Given i go to website with chrome...........................................passed When i click signin button..................................................passed Then i click emailspan......................................................passed Then i click create an account button.......................................passed Then i fill the mandatory fields of the register form.......................passed Then i click register.......................................................passed Then i click home button and assert username................................passed Then i click dresses > summer dresses.......................................passed Then i add a summer dress product in basket.................................passed Then i search summer on the searchbar.......................................passed Then i add a summer dress product in basket.................................passed Then i click card > checkout................................................passed Then i click proceed checkout...............................................passed Then i click proceed checkout for shipping address..........................passed Then i click terms of signing of shipping...................................passed Then i click proceed checkout...............................................passed Then i choose bankwire payment method.......................................passed Then i click order confirmation.............................................passed Then i click user account...................................................passed Then i click order history and detail.......................................passed
